pkgmetadata.longdescription: Density Estimation with Soft Information by Exponential Epi- splines // Produce one-dimensional density estimates using exponential epi-splines. The user may incorporate soft information, by imposing constraints that (i) require unimodality; (ii) require that the density be monotone non- increase or non-decreasing; (iii) put upper bounds on first or second moments; (iv) bound the density's values at mesh points; (v) require that the estimate be continuous or continuously differentiable; and more.
